snippet: Indian athletes will compete under the Olympic flag, not their national flag, at next month’s Winter Games in Sochi, Russia.
abstract: Indian athletes will compete under the Olympic flag, not their national flag, at Winter Games in Sochi, Russia; the three Indians who qualified for the Games will compete as 'independent' athletes, rather than representing their country; Indian Olympic Association was suspended by International Olympic Committee in 2012.
lead_paragraph: Indian athletes will compete under the Olympic flag, not their national flag, at next month’s Winter Games in Sochi, Russia.

headline.main: Indians to Compete as Independents in Sochi
